metadata.title: Rick Astley - Never Gonna Give You Up (Official Video) (4K Remaster)
metadata.description:
The official video for “Never Gonna Give You Up” by Rick Astley. 

Never: The Autobiography 📚 OUT NOW! 
Follow this link to get your copy and listen to Rick’s ‘Never’ playlist ❤️ #RickAstleyNever
https://linktr.ee/rickastleynever

“Never Gonna Give You Up” was a global smash on its release in July 1987, topping the charts in 25 countries including Rick’s native UK and the US Billboard Hot 100.  It also won the Brit Award for Best single in 1988. Stock Aitken and Waterman wrote and produced the track which was the lead-off single and lead track from Rick’s debut LP “Whenever You Need Somebody”.  The album was itself a UK number one and would go on to sell over 15 million copies worldwide.

The legendary video was directed by Simon West – who later went on to make Hollywood blockbusters such as Con Air, Lara Croft – Tomb Raider and The Expendables 2.  The video passed the 1bn YouTube views milestone on 28 July 2021.

Subscribe to the official Rick Astley YouTube channel: https://RickAstley.lnk.to/YTSubID

Follow Rick Astley:
Facebook: https://RickAstley.lnk.to/FBFollowID 
Twitter: https://RickAstley.lnk.to/TwitterID 
Instagram: https://RickAstley.lnk.to/InstagramID 
Website: https://RickAstley.lnk.to/storeID 
TikTok: https://RickAstley.lnk.to/TikTokID

Listen to Rick Astley:
Spotify: https://RickAstley.lnk.to/SpotifyID 
Apple Music: https://RickAstley.lnk.to/AppleMusicID 
Amazon Music: https://RickAstley.lnk.to/AmazonMusicID 
Deezer: https://RickAstley.lnk.to/DeezerID 

Lyrics:
We’re no strangers to love
You know the rules and so do I
A full commitment’s what I’m thinking of
You wouldn’t get this from any other guy

I just wanna tell you how I’m feeling
Gotta make you understand

Never gonna give you up
Never gonna let you down
Never gonna run around and desert you
Never gonna make you cry
Never gonna say goodbye
Never gonna tell a lie and hurt you

We’ve known each other for so long
Your heart’s been aching but you’re too shy to say it
Inside we both know what’s been going on
We know the game and we’re gonna play it

And if you ask me how I’m feeling
Don’t tell me you’re too blind to see

Never gonna give you up
Never gonna let you down
Never gonna run around and desert you
Never gonna make you cry
Never gonna say goodbye
Never gonna tell a lie and hurt you

#RickAstley #NeverGonnaGiveYouUp #WheneverYouNeedSomebody #OfficialMusicVideo

fortnite never gonna give you up
never gonna give u up lyrics
never gonna give you up karaoke

key_points.text: The narrator states a shared familiarity with the concept of love with the listener.
The narrator and listener mutually understand the unwritten 'rules' of their interaction.
The narrator is pursuing a relationship characterized by complete dedication.
The narrator emphasizes their exclusive ability to provide such a deep level of commitment.
The narrator has an immediate desire to convey their emotional state.
The narrator feels a responsibility to ensure the listener comprehends their intentions.
The narrator explicitly promises perpetual support by declaring 'Never gonna give you up'.
The narrator commits to never causing disappointment, stating 'Never gonna let you down'.
The narrator vows against abandonment or disloyalty, asserting 'Never gonna run around and desert you'.
The narrator pledges to protect the listener from emotional pain, ensuring 'Never gonna make you cry'.
The narrator promises an enduring presence, stating 'Never gonna say goodbye'.
The narrator commits to absolute honesty and avoidance of harm, affirming 'Never gonna tell a lie and hurt you'.
The relationship between the narrator and listener has existed for an extended period.
The narrator observes the listener's internal emotional distress, indicating an 'aching heart'.
The narrator recognizes the listener's hesitation to vocalize their feelings due to shyness.
Both parties share an internal, unspoken awareness of the developing situation.
The narrator and listener are conscious participants in a metaphorical 'game' of their relationship.
The narrator expresses an intention to actively engage in the aforementioned 'game'.
The narrator implies that their feelings should be self-evident to the listener.
The narrator implicitly dismisses the possibility of the listener being 'too blind to see' their emotions.
The core promise of 'never giving up' is powerfully reiterated multiple times.
The commitment to 'never letting down' is reinforced through repetition.
The pledge against 'running around and deserting' is a repeated assurance of fidelity.
The vow to 'never make you cry' is consistently emphasized as a promise of emotional protection.
The declaration of 'never saying goodbye' serves as a continuous assurance of permanence.
The promise of 'never telling a lie and hurting you' is a recurring theme of honesty and care.
The narrator expresses a consistent desire for the listener to understand their emotional state.
The long-standing nature of their relationship forms a foundation for the narrator's trust.
The narrator's awareness of the listener's shyness highlights a nuanced understanding of their partner.
The mutual understanding implies a strong, albeit unspoken, emotional bond between them.

summary:
The provided transcript, comprising the lyrics to Rick Astley's "Never Gonna Give You Up," details a speaker's profound and unwavering commitment to a romantic interest. The narrator establishes a deep, long-standing connection with the listener, emphasizing their shared understanding of the unspoken "rules" and "game" of their relationship. The core message revolves around the narrator's earnest desire for a "full commitment," asserting that such devotion is unique to them compared to any "other guy".

A central theme of the lyrics is the narrator's repeated and emphatic pledges of loyalty, support, and honesty. They vow never to abandon, disappoint, betray, cause distress, or deceive the listener, explicitly stating their intention to never "give you up," "let you down," "run around and desert you," "make you cry," "say goodbye," or "tell a lie and hurt you." These promises are reiterated multiple times throughout the song, underscoring the sincerity and steadfastness of their affections.

Furthermore, the narrator acknowledges the listener's emotional state, noting a "heart's been aching" and a shyness to articulate their feelings, yet affirming a mutual, unspoken understanding of their ongoing dynamic. The song concludes with a final reaffirmation of the core commitments, reinforcing the message of enduring love and trust.

retention_decision.video_path: cache/Rick Astley - Never Gonna Give You Up (Official Video) (4K Remaster)-dQw4w9WgXcQ.mp3

timeline_v2.message: Timeline features discontinued - focusing on core intelligence extraction
